messages.message:
Hi all — as part of Winter cleaning, and preparing us for greater automated testing, we’ve launched Flask unit-tests:

Flask unit-tests allow us to test Flask handlers in a unit-test setup. See this document for more information. I’ve recorded two videos which give you the background on why we have them, and how to set one up yourself.
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1abIC5dqt_YET4szxEh6pjd83DA2LIRNEypZGDleWtQ0/edit#heading=h.mnx3ibo1w1wj

cc: @Jessica @Heymian @shaunak @Mohit @achao @Eric Han @Chetan @lydia @Aaron Vontell @Erick @Shivam @sudeep @Hari + others who likely will be writing Flask handlers and wanting to setup tests for them.

Thanks Shaunak for first figuring out how to set these up!
